description: The Statlog Vehicle Silhouettes dataset contains features extracted from 2D silhouettes of four types of vehicles. The purpose is to classify vehicle silhouettes using shape features extracted by the HIPS (Hierarchical Image Processing System) extension BINATTS, which combines classical moment-based measures and heuristic shape descriptors.
creator: JP Siebert (Turing Institute)

feature_descriptions.COMPACTNESS: (average perimeter)^2/area - measures how compact the shape is
feature_descriptions.CIRCULARITY: (average radius)^2/area - measures how circular the shape is
feature_descriptions.MAX.LENGTH_ASPECT_RATIO: Ratio based on maximum length measurements
feature_descriptions.SCALED_VARIANCE_MAJOR: Second order moment about major axis scaled by area
feature_descriptions.SCALED_VARIANCE_MINOR: Second order moment about minor axis scaled by area
feature_descriptions.SKEWNESS_ABOUT_MAJOR: Third order moment about major axis
feature_descriptions.SKEWNESS_ABOUT_MINOR: Third order moment about minor axis
feature_descriptions.KURTOSIS_ABOUT_MAJOR: Fourth order moment about major axis
feature_descriptions.KURTOSIS_ABOUT_MINOR: Fourth order moment about minor axis
feature_descriptions.HOLLOWS_RATIO: Area of hollows/area of bounding polygon

use_case: Vehicle type classification from silhouettes for applications in traffic monitoring, automated toll systems, parking management, and security surveillance

data_collection.sets: Two sets (e2 and e3) of 60 images each per vehicle

expected_difficulty: Bus and van expected to be easily distinguishable from cars, but distinguishing between the two car models (Saab and Opel) expected to be more challenging
ethical_considerations: Dataset uses toy models rather than real vehicles, limiting real-world applicability. Care should be taken when generalizing to actual vehicle recognition systems.

citations.author: Siebert, JP
citations.title: Vehicle Recognition Using Rule Based Methods

original_source.creator: JP Siebert (Turing Institute)
original_source.publication: Siebert, JP: Vehicle Recognition Using Rule Based Methods
